alert.note: Alert for Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 10:14AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ouachita County through 1045 AM CDT... At 1014 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chidester, or 12 miles northwest of Camden, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Camden... Stephens... Chidester... Louann... Poison Springs State Park... Cullendale... White Oak Lake State Park... Kirkland... Reader... Frenchport... Elliot... Cross Roads in Ouachita County... Fairview in Ouachita County... Troy... Bragg City... Buena Vista... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
